thread.title: South's commuters face chaotic journeys during Tube strike
thread.title_full: South's commuters face chaotic journeys during Tube strike | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: South's commuters face chaotic journeys during Tube strike
text:
Disruption for commuters from the South Credit: ITV The South's commuters are facing more disruption because of a strike by London Underground workers.
Services stopped on Wednesday evening and are not expected to resume until Friday morning.
The second walkout in the space of a month comes amid a row between unions and Tube bosses over the launch of an all-night weekend service, due to begin on 12 September.
Hundreds of traffic jams have been reported in London long miles of tailbacks as the capital was hit by travel chaos.
Last updated Thu 6 Aug 2015 Travel London
